prompt: Generate an n8n workflow that: 1) triggers when a deal is marked ‘Closed Won’ in Pipedrive, 2) creates a Google Drive client folder, 3) sends a pre-filled DocuSign contract, 4) shares onboarding docs, 5) books a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar, and 6) notifies the team in Slack.

workflow.name: Pipedrive Deal Won - Client Onboarding Automation
